text: Boris Ottokar Unbegaun () (1898-1973) was a Russian-born German linguist and philologist, expert in Slavic studies: Slavic languages and literature. He worked in universities of France, Great Britain and the United States.Robert Magidoff; George Y. Shevelov; J. S. G. Simmons, J.S.G.; Kiril Taronovski (Hrsg.), Studies in Slavic Linguistics and Poetics in Honour of Boris O. Unbegaun, New York, New York University Press 1968Unbegaun, Boris Ottokar, KATALOG DER DEUTSCHEN NATIONALBIBLIOTHEKTsvetaeva, Marina, 1892-1941.
